entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HybridWebView/WebView - Implement methods for playsinline, autoplay, and other playback configuration options #23747
  • InputTransparent property makes all children disabled #23744
  • I am using this method ( .NET 8 ) but it display a white screen after splash screen #23743
  • Maui Blazor Hybrid app crashes on connected device after splash screen, but works on simulator #23741

Closed

  • Image disappears after navigating back to page #18895
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fire UpdateValue after all propertychange events #23746
  • [Android] Page.IsBusy activity indicators gets stuck/causes multiple to be displayed #23745
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #23742
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix iOS log exports #23334
    area-infrastructure
  • [Windows] Subscribe pointer events only when needed #23515
    community ✨
  • HybridWebView: Remove unneeded DefaultFile / HybridRoot handler properties #23730
    area-controls-hybridwebview

Updated

  • Obsolete setting mainpage via application #23692
  • Initial Commit #23738
  • NavigationBarColors from NavigationPage not changing on AppTheme changin - fix #23343
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-toolbar
  • Android ecosystem updates 20240618 based on net9.0 branch #23271
    area-infrastructure
  • Don't let Glide clear the old image on Android ImageView unless we get an error #23313
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-image
